name: Zombie Crime City: FPS Master
description:
Zombie Crime City: FPS Master Attack is one of the best zombie games to play. Zombie assault games are just like hunting and shooting games. Save the innocent citizens from attacking and deadly zombies. You are the only hope to save people from killing zombies.
Features:
- Realistic 3D environment
- Efficient controls and easy game-play
- Story based missions
- First Person Shooter (FPS)
- Different snipers and assault rifles in this action game.
